title: bufio: remove redundant private flush method from bufio package and move its code to public Flush
body:
https://github.com/golang/go/blob/master/src/bufio/bufio.go#L551

Looks like it is a leftover from https://github.com/golang/go/commit/99f67228608db9c9a587586186ec612feb425e48 and https://github.com/golang/go/issues/6086.
